title: SOLD: 1888 N162 Ed Andrews SGC 30 - nice appearance
author: scooter729

posts.post_title: SOLD: 1888 N162 Ed Andrews SGC 30 - nice appearance
posts.post_content:
Hi - selling the pictured 1888 N162 card of Ed Andrews - really nice appearance on this one.  A spot of pulled paper / paper loss near his chin causes it to be downgraded to a 30.

Price is $SOLD delivered - PayPal F/F preferred but any of the regular payment methods accepted.

Thanks for looking!
Scott
